findings.title: DelegateBySig() Can Be Called with Unused (nonce, expiry)
findings.description: BunnyToken#delegateBySig() does not verify if the signer is the delegator, allowing another address's voting power to be delegated instead of the delegator.

findings.title: BunnyPool,VaultFlipToCake#notifyRewardAmount() can decrease rewardRate
findings.description: The notifyRewardAmount() function does not check if the rewardRate decreases after notification. If admin keeps notifying with zero reward, it can lead to continuous decrease on reward rate.
